name: Branches to Branches
description: Branches to Branches is a Platformer adventure where you must jump, climb and fireball your way through a labyrinth filled with dangerous creatures, hidden secrets, and all sorts of unique locations. As a creature born from the Forest of Rebirth, you must destroy a force which could threaten the vitality of your forest. Travel through 6 areas, conquer 3 bosses and discover many collectibles and upgrades in order to complete your quest, and save your forest.
